metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 1 â€” DESCRIPTION OF BUSINESS, ACCOUNTING POLICIES, AND SUPPLEMENTAL DISCLOSURES/
aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Technology and Infrastructure Cost Components
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in research and development of new and existing products and services.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in development of stores.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in design of stores.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in maintenance of stores.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in curation of products and services made available in Amazon's online stores.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in display of products and services made available in Amazon's online stores.
Infrastructure costs include servers.
Infrastructure costs include networking equipment.
Infrastructure costs include data center related depreciation and amortization.
Infrastructure costs include rent.
Infrastructure costs include utilities.
Infrastructure costs include other expenses necessary to support Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Infrastructure costs include other expenses necessary to support other Amazon businesses.
Technology and infrastructure costs reflect investments made to offer a wide variety of products and services to Amazon's customers.
Technology and infrastructure investments include expenditures related to initiatives to build innovative software.
Technology and infrastructure investments include expenditures related to initiatives to deploy innovative software.
Technology and infrastructure investments include expenditures related to initiatives to build efficient software.
Technology and infrastructure investments include expenditures related to initiatives to deploy efficient software.
Technology and infrastructure investments include expenditures related to initiatives to build electronic devices.
Technology and infrastructure investments include expenditures related to initiatives to deploy electronic devices.
Technology and infrastructure investments include expenditures related to development of a satellite network for global broadband service.
Technology and infrastructure investments include expenditures related to development of autonomous vehicles for ride-hailing services.
Technology and infrastructure costs are generally expensed as incurred.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 1 â€” DESCRIPTION OF BUSINESS, ACCOUNTING POLICIES, AND SUPPLEMENTAL DISCLOSURES/

/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 1 â€” DESCRIPTION OF BUSINESS, ACCOUNTING POLICIES, AND SUPPLEMENTAL DISCLOSURES/

text:
###### Technology and Infrastructure

Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll and related expenses for employees involved in the research and development of new and existing products and services, development, design, and maintenance of our stores, curation and display of products and services made available in our online stores, and infrastructure costs. Infrastructure costs include servers, networking equipment, and data center related depreciation and amortization, rent, utilities, and other expenses necessary to support AWS and other Amazon businesses. Collectively, these costs reflect the investments we make in order to offer a wide variety of products and services to our customers, including expenditures related to initiatives to build and deploy innovative and efficient software and electronic devices and the development of a satellite network for global broadband service and autonomous vehicles for ride-hailing services. Technology and infrastructure costs are generally expensed as incurred.
